title: Stranger Things, Surfer Boy Pizza, Magnetic Notepad
features: Flaunt your fandom on the fridge or locker with Netflix’s Stranger Things magnetic notepads.
Magnetic backing allows you to adhere to the notepad to any magnetic surface and easily make note of any strange ideas, shopping lists, or even details on your next DND campaign.
Stranger Things magnetic notepads make a perfect gift for fans of the sci-fi series and is an exciting and functional Stranger Things collectible.
OFFICIALLY LICENSED. Designed by Genuine Fred with an official license from Netflix. See the entire Stranger Things collection in Genuine Fred's brand store.
description: Flaunt your fandom on the fridge or locker with Netflix’s Stranger Things magnetic notepads. Conveniently adhering to any magnetic surface, make note of all those strange things to remember. Extra pineapple for pizza perhaps? Comes in 2 styles: Surfer Boy Pizza and Hellfire Club. Each 50-sheet pad measures 8.7 x 4". Packed in an OPP bag with a header card.
